sentences.sContent: One boy is more trouble than a dozen girls.
sentences.sContent_eng: One boy is more trouble than a dozen girls.
sentences.sCn: 一个男孩比十二个女孩增添的麻烦还多。

sentences.sContent: The reduced price will save you one dollar for each dozen.
sentences.sContent_eng: The reduced price will save you one dollar for each dozen.
sentences.sCn: 下调了的价格每一打将能节省你一个美元。

sentences.sContent: We painted together every day. He presented me with half a dozen of his works, which are going to be in the exhibition.
sentences.sContent_eng: We painted together every day. He presented me with half a dozen of his works, which are going to be in the exhibition.
sentences.sCn: 我们每天一起画画，他给我看了半打他的画作，这些从未公诸于世过的作品，将会在这次画展中展出。
